Text: Once I downloaded the game how do I load it on to a disc?

You need a DVD burner and a blank DVD +/- R.

Also need a program that can burn images such as Alcohol 120% or DVD Decrypter. (then just set the program to burn an image, select the downloaded image, put in the blank disc and burn)

For those who cant play, i'll (try to) help.
To play it on your modded ps2, just grab the .iso file, and burn it to a blank DVD-R with x4 speed.

For those who want to play it on PC, any ps2 emulator will do :P.
